name: 20.000 Leagues Under The Sea - Captain Nemo
description: Discover the furthest recesses of the Nautilus, take the helm and pass through the Isthmus of Suez, gaze upon hitherto unseen places under the waves! But beware, the apparently peaceful depths can hide terrible dangers!
minimum_requirements: Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB
